name.ja: <ruby>刻まれし魔の神聖棺<rt>デモンスミス・アグヌスデイ</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2+ monsters, including a LIGHT Fiend monster
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 LIGHT non-Link Fiend monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, equip this card you control to it as an Equip Spell with the following effects.
● The equipped monster gains ATK equal to the total Link Rating of Link Monsters equipped to it x 600.
● If the equipped monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

materials: 2+ monsters, including a LIGHT Fiend monster
